metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Prefix truncation attack on BPP: By manipulating sequence numbers duringthe handshake, an attacker can remove the initial messages on the securechannel without causing a MAC failure.

criterions.comment: openssh package in fips-updates/focal is affected and may need fixing.
dropbear package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-go.crypto package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
snapd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libssh package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libssh2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openssh-ssh1 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
paramiko package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
putty package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
proftpd-dfsg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
python-asyncssh package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
